doc:
Emo Philips https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emo_Philips 0 Emo Philips (born February 7, 1956) is an American stand-up comedian, actor, voice actor, writer and producer. His stand-up comedy persona makes use of paraprosdokians spoken in a wandering falsetto tone of voice. The confused, childlike delivery of his material produces the intended comic timing in a manner invoking the "wisdom of children" or the idiot savant. Emo_Philips ( born February_7_,_1956 ) is an_American_stand-up_comedian , actor , voice_actor , writer_and_producer . His_stand-up_comedy_persona makes use of paraprosdokians spoken in a_wandering_falsetto_tone of voice . The_confused_,_childlike_delivery of his_material produces the_intended_comic_timing in a_manner invoking the_"_wisdom of children " or the idiot savant .
